revised_title: The Role of Corpora Allata in Dipterous Insects
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on Calliphora larvae to study the function of Weismann's ring, also known as corpora allata. They found that removing or damaging the corpora allata prevents pupation in dipterous insects. This discovery sheds light on the role of hormones in insect development and growth.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Insect Development
